channel.title: I can't upload pictures without it failing
channel.description:
I've had a problem for quite some time now with uploading photos to a sharing site, E.G Tinypic, photobucket, etc. I have tried Firefox and Opera, neither of them will upload. It will just say the upload failed. This has been happening for a few weeks now and I am wondering if anyone had the slightest idea on what's up, since I never had this problem before.
I can upload other file extensions to sites such as mediashare and megaupload, but anything dealing with pictures for photo sharing sites is a no go. Changing the file extension from bmp to jpeg does not work either.

item.title: I can't upload pictures without it failing
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

cows_be_sacred:

Check to see if javascript is enabled on your browser then download the latest flash and see if you’re running the latest java update (21 I think). Hope that’ll do something.

I was thinking the same thing about IE but he tried more browsers and it didn’t work.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't upload pictures without it failing

item.title: I can't upload pictures without it failing
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

Check to see if javascript is enabled on your browser then download the latest flash and see if you’re running the latest java update (21 I think). Hope that’ll do something.

edit: after that go ahead and clear you’re browsers cache, browsing history and everything else.
edit2: try doing this with firefox, it might be more effective

Read full topic
item.source: I can't upload pictures without it failing

item.title: I can't upload pictures without it failing
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Maybe your firewall is blocking the upload? have you tried turning it off?

Read full topic
